p: Soil characteristics in the 59 sample sites at 13 locations are presented in Supplementary Material ( Supplementary Table S3). Briefly, among these sites, the soils pH ranged from 5.2 to 7.78; soil organic matter ranged from 3.51 to 43.82 mg kg –1; alkali-hydrolysable N ranged from 1.49 to 82.16 mg kg –1; available P ranged from 0.94 to 88.98 mg kg –1; and available K ranged from 4.34 to 321.84 mg kg –1 ( Supplementary Table S3).
